languages.text: Подходит срок уплаты десятины, однако использование коррупционных схем Администратума позволит оставить себе и псайкеров, и троны.
The date for the payment of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.
languages.original_text: Подходит срок уплаты десятины, однако использование коррупционных схем Администратума позволит оставить себе и псайкеров, и троны.

traits.locale_text: The due date of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.
The due date of the tithe approaches, and by using corrupted schematics it is possible to keep both psykers and gold.
The date for the payment of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.
The due date of the tithe approaches, and by using corrupted schematics, it is possible to keep both the psykers and the gold.
The due date of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.
The date for the payment of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.
The date for the payment of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.

languages.text: La date du paiement de la dîme approche. Cela étant, il n'est pas impossible de conserver aussi bien vos psykers que vos trônes en usant des pratiques corrompues de l'Administratum.
languages.original_text: The date for the payment of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.

traits.locale_text: La date du paiement de la dîme approche. Cela étant, il n'est pas impossible de conserver aussi bien vos psykers que vos trônes en usant des pratiques corrompues de l'Administratum.

languages.text: 10分の1税の納付日が近づいてきた。しかし、アドミニストラトゥムの腐敗した慣習を利用すれば、異能者とスローンの両方を維持する方法を見つけることができる。
languages.original_text: The date for the payment of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.

traits.locale_text: 10分の1税の納付日が近づいてきた。しかし、アドミニストラトゥムの腐敗した慣習を利用すれば、異能者とスローンの両方を維持する方法を見つけることができる。

languages.text: 什一税的缴纳期限近在眼前。不过，如果能想办法腐化内政部的成员，说不定就能找到办法，不必再为帝国提供灵能者与税金。
languages.original_text: The date for the payment of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.

traits.locale_text: 什一税的缴纳期限近在眼前。不过，如果能想办法腐化内政部的成员，说不定就能找到办法，不必再为帝国提供灵能者与税金。

languages.text: La fecha de pago del diezmo se acerca. Sin embargo, aprovechando la corrupción del Administratum, sería posible conservar tanto los tronos como a los psíquicos.
languages.original_text: The date for the payment of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.

traits.locale_text: La fecha de pago del diezmo se acerca. Sin embargo, aprovechando la corrupción del Administratum, sería posible conservar tanto los tronos como a los psíquicos.

languages.text: Bald ist der Zehnt fällig. Durch den Einsatz der korrupten Praktiken des Administratums ließe sich aber ein Weg finden, sowohl die Psioniker als auch die Thronmünzen zu behalten.
languages.original_text: The date for the payment of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.

traits.locale_text: Bald ist der Zehnt fällig. Durch den Einsatz der korrupten Praktiken des Administratums ließe sich aber ein Weg finden, sowohl die Psioniker als auch die Thronmünzen zu behalten.

languages.text: Aşarın ödeme tarihi yaklaşıyor. Lakin Administratum'un yozluklarından yararlanırak hem ruhsezerleri hem de geltleri elde tutmak mümkün olabilir.
languages.original_text: The date for the payment of the tithe approaches. However, by making use of the corrupt practices of the Administratum, one could find a way to keep both the psykers and the thrones.
